Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Interface MVEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
View
public interface MVEventListener
Listener interface for Controller-generated events. MVEvent (Events form Server)
Author:
Giorgio Corbetta

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void update​(BlockBuiltEvent blockBuilt)
    Updates listener about the Construction of a block.
    void update​(BlockRemovedEvent blockRemoved)
    Updates listener about the removal of a block.
    void update​(CardSelectedEvent cardSelected)
    Updates listener about the selection of a Card performed by a Player.
    void update​(CardsInformationEvent cardsInformation)
    Updates listener with Cards information.
    void update​(ErrorMessageEvent message)
    Updates listener with an Error message generated by the Controller.
    void update​(GameOverEvent gameOver)
    Updates listener informing it that the Game is over.
    void update​(GameResumingEvent gameResuming)
    Updates listener about an ongoing Game (previously saved) that can be resumed.
    void update​(InvalidNicknameEvent invalidNickname)
    Updates listener informing it that the submitted nickname is invalid.
    void update​(LobbyFullEvent lobbyFull)
    Updates listener informing it that the game lobby is full.
    void update​(MessageEvent message)
    Updates listener with a Message generated by the Controller.
    void update​(NextStatusEvent nextStatus)
    Updates listener that the next Game status was reached.
    void update​(PlayerLoseEvent playerLose)
    Updates listener about the loss of a Player.
    void update​(PlayerWinEvent playerWin)
    Updates listener about the winning of a Player.
    void update​(RequirePlaceWorkersEvent requirePlaceWorkers)
    Updates listener asking for the Player to place his/her own Worker.
    void update​(RequirePlayersNumberEvent requirePlayersNumber)
    Updates listener asking for the number of players for the upcoming Game.
    void update​(RequireStartPlayerEvent requireStartPlayer)
    Updates listener asking for the Start Player for the upcoming game.
    void update​(ServerQuitEvent serverQuit)
    Updates listener informing it that Server is quitting the connection with its Client.
    void update​(ServerSendDataEvent serverSentData)
    Updates listener with important Game info.
    void update​(TurnStatusChangedEvent turnStatusChange)
    Updates listener about the Turn change of a Player.
    void update​(UndoOkEvent undoOk)
    Updates listener informing that the last performed move was undone.
    void update​(WorkerMovedEvent workerMoved)
    Updates listener about the Movement of a Worker.
    void update​(WorkerPlacedEvent workerPlaced)
    Updates listener about the placement of a Worker.
    void update​(WorkerRemovedEvent workerRemoved)
    Updates listener about the removal of a Worker.
    void update​(WorkerSelectedEvent workerSelected)
    Updates listener informing that a Worker was selected.
    void update​(java.lang.Object o)
    Updates listener with a (generic) unspecified Event.

    • update

      void update​(UndoOkEvent undoOk)
      Updates listener informing that the last performed move was undone.
      Parameters:
      undoOk - Event: Last performed move was undone. UndoOkEvent gives data to restore the last consistent state.
